genericTables.query-all-ids: SELECT obj.objectid FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN objecttypes objtype ON obj.objecttypes_id = objtype.id WHERE objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.query-all-idsandrev: SELECT obj.objectid, obj.rev FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN objecttypes objtype ON obj.objecttypes_id = objtype.id WHERE objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.links-for-sourceId: SELECT fullobject FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.${_propTable} prop ON obj.id = prop.${_mainTable}_id INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE prop.propkey='/sourceId' AND prop.propvalue = ${sourceId} AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.links-for-targetId: SELECT fullobject FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.${_propTable} prop ON obj.id = prop.${_mainTable}_id INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE prop.propkey='/targetId' AND prop.propvalue = ${targetId} AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.links-for-sourceId-db2: SELECT fullobject FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.${_propTable} prop ON obj.id = prop.${_mainTable}_id INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE prop.propkey='/sourceId' AND CAST(prop.propvalue AS varchar(1024)) = ${sourceId} AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.links-for-targetId-db2: SELECT fullobject FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.${_propTable} prop ON obj.id = prop.${_mainTable}_id INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE prop.propkey='/targetId' AND CAST(prop.propvalue AS varchar(1024))= ${targetId} AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}
genericTables.query-without-token: SELECT fullobject FROM openidm.managedobjects obj INNER JOIN openidm.managedobjectproperties prop ON obj.id = prop.managedobjects_id INNER JOIN openidm.managedobjectproperties prop2 ON prop.managedobjects_id = prop2.managedobjects_id INNER JOIN openidm.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE (prop.propkey='/lastname' AND prop.propvalue like 'Eglo%' AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}) AND (prop2.propkey='/test' AND prop2.propvalue = 'inlinequery' AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}) GROUP BY prop.managedobjects_id
genericTables.query-with-where-token: SELECT fullobject FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.${_propTable} prop ON obj.id = prop.${_mainTable}_id INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.${_propTable} prop2 ON prop.${_mainTable}_id = prop2.${_mainTable}_id INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE (prop.propkey='/lastname' AND prop.propvalue like 'Eglo%' AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}) AND (prop2.propkey='/test' AND prop2.propvalue = ${querytype} AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}) GROUP BY prop.${_mainTable}_id
genericTables.query-with-from-token: SELECT fullobject FROM ${_dbSchema}.${_mainTable} obj INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.${_propTable} prop ON obj.id = prop.${_mainTable}_id INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.${_propTable} prop2 ON prop.${_mainTable}_id = prop2.${_mainTable}_id INNER JOIN ${_dbSchema}.objecttypes objtype ON objtype.id = obj.objecttypes_id WHERE (prop.propkey='/lastname' AND prop.propvalue like 'Eglo%' AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}) AND (prop2.propkey='/test' AND prop2.propvalue = 'inlinequery' AND objtype.objecttype = ${_resource}) GROUP BY prop.${_mainTable}_id
